articles.author: AAMER MADHANI, ZEKE MILLER
articles.title: Biden says he's decided on response to killing of 3 US troops, plans to attend dignified transfer - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Joe Biden says he has decided how to respond to the killing of three American service members in Jordan, noting that he does not want to expand war in the Middle East but demurring on the specifics of how the U.S. will proceed. Officials say they ar…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Joe Biden on Tuesday indicated he had decided how to respond after the killing of three American service members Sunday in a drone attack in Jordan that his administration h… [+4610 chars]
